name: [bird] in [forest]
description: Count the total number of birds you currently have in this specific habitat row.

name: [bird] in [grassland]
description: Count the total number of birds you currently have in this specific habitat row.

name: [bird] in [wetland]
description: Count the total number of birds you currently have in this specific habitat row.

name: [egg] in [forest]
description: Count the total number of eggs your birds have laid in this specific habitat row. Multiple eggs on one bird each count.

name: [egg] in [grassland]
description: Count the total number of eggs your birds have laid in this specific habitat row. Multiple eggs on one bird each count.

name: [egg] in [wetland]
description: Count the total number of eggs your birds have laid in this specific habitat row. Multiple eggs on one bird each count.

name: [egg] in [bowl]
description: Count the total number of eggs on birds with this specific nest type. Multiple eggs on one bird each count. Star nests count toward this goal.

name: [egg] in [cavity]
description: Count the total number of eggs on birds with this specific nest type. Multiple eggs on one bird each count. Star nests count toward this goal.

name: [egg] in [ground]
description: Count the total number of eggs on birds with this specific nest type. Multiple eggs on one bird each count. Star nests count toward this goal.

name: [egg] in [platform]
description: Count the total number of eggs on birds with this specific nest type. Multiple eggs on one bird each count. Star nests count toward this goal.

name: [bowl] [bird] with [egg]
description: Count the total number of birds with this specific nest type that have at least 1 egg. Each bird counts just once, regardless of how many eggs it has. Star nests count toward this goal.

name: [cavity] [bird] with [egg]
description: Count the total number of birds with this specific nest type that have at least 1 egg. Each bird counts just once, regardless of how many eggs it has. Star nests count toward this goal.

name: [ground] [bird] with [egg]
description: Count the total number of birds with this specific nest type that have at least 1 egg. Each bird counts just once, regardless of how many eggs it has. Star nests count toward this goal.

name: [platform] [bird] with [egg]
description: Count the total number of birds with this specific nest type that have at least 1 egg. Each bird counts just once, regardless of how many eggs it has. Star nests count toward this goal.

name: total [bird]
description: Count the total number of birds you have played.

name: sets of [egg][egg][egg] in [wetland][grassland][forest]
description: One set of eggs consists of 1 egg in the wetland row, 1 egg in the grassland row, and 1 egg in the forest row. Count the number of sets.
